quotes.q: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
quotes.h:
“Intense love does not measure, it just gives.” —
Mother Teresa

quotes.q: Preoccupied with a single leaf you won't see the tree.
quotes.h:
“Preoccupied with a single leaf you won't see the tree.” —
Unknown

quotes.q: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
quotes.h:
“Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.” —
Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.q: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
quotes.h:
“I learned the value of hard work by working hard. ” —
Margaret Mead

quotes.q: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
quotes.h:
“Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying. ” —
W. Clement Stone

quotes.q: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
quotes.h:
“A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.” —
George Bernard Shaw

quotes.q: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
quotes.h:
“The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.” —
Voltaire

quotes.q: A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
quotes.h:
“A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.q: Family not only needs to consist of merely those whom we share blood, but also of those whom we'd give blood.
quotes.h:
“Family not only needs to consist of merely those whom we share blood, but also of those whom we'd give blood.” —
Charles Dickens

quotes.q: Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.
quotes.h:
“Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.” —
Simon Sinek

quotes.q: How to get more opportunity: Create more opportunity for others.
quotes.h:
“How to get more opportunity: Create more opportunity for others.” —
Jack Butcher

quotes.q: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.h:
“What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.” —
Ralph Marston

quotes.q: If you try to get rid of fear and anger without knowing their meaning, they will grow stronger and return.
quotes.h:
“If you try to get rid of fear and anger without knowing their meaning, they will grow stronger and return.” —
Deepak Chopra

quotes.q: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.h:
“Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.” —
Jim Rohn

quotes.q: Among the things you can give and still keep are your word, a smile, and a grateful heart.
quotes.h:
“Among the things you can give and still keep are your word, a smile, and a grateful heart.” —
Zig Ziglar

quotes.q: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
quotes.h:
“Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.” —
Bob Dylan

quotes.q: Observe things as they are and don't pay attention to other people.
quotes.h:
“Observe things as they are and don't pay attention to other people.” —
Huang Po

quotes.q: You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!
quotes.h:
“You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!” —
John Lennon

quotes.q: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
quotes.h:
“Quiet people have the loudest minds.” —
Stephen Hawking

quotes.q: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.h:
“Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better. ” —
Samuel Beckett

quotes.q: The fastest way to change is to laugh at your own folly.
quotes.h:
“The fastest way to change is to laugh at your own folly.” —
Spencer Johnson

quotes.q: Those who bring sunshine into the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
quotes.h:
“Those who bring sunshine into the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.” —
James Matthew Barrie

quotes.q: Everybody has talent, but ability takes hard work.
quotes.h:
“Everybody has talent, but ability takes hard work.” —
Michael Jordan

quotes.q: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.h:
“Happiness depends upon ourselves.” —
Aristotle

quotes.q: If you go out looking for friends, you're going to find they are very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere.
quotes.h:
“If you go out looking for friends, you're going to find they are very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere.” —
Zig Ziglar

quotes.q: Throw your heart over the fence and the rest will follow
quotes.h:
“Throw your heart over the fence and the rest will follow” —
Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.q: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
quotes.h:
“Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.” —
Les Brown

quotes.q: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.
quotes.h:
“Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.” —
A.A. Milne

quotes.q: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotes.h:
“Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.” —
Michael Jordan

quotes.q: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.h:
“A loving heart is the truest wisdom.” —
Charles Dickens

quotes.q: If you only knew the magnificence of the 3, 6, and 9, then you would have a key to the universe.
quotes.h:
“If you only knew the magnificence of the 3, 6, and 9, then you would have a key to the universe.” —
Nikola Tesla

quotes.q: Everything that irritates us about others.
quotes.h:
“Everything that irritates us about others.” —
Carl Jung

quotes.q: If you see someone without a smile give them one of yours.
quotes.h:
“If you see someone without a smile give them one of yours.” —
Unknown

quotes.q: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
quotes.h:
“What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?” —
George Eliot

quotes.q: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
quotes.h:
“If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration. ” —
Nikola Tesla

quotes.q: I put my heart and soul into my work, and I have lost my mind in the process.
quotes.h:
“I put my heart and soul into my work, and I have lost my mind in the process.” —
Vincent van Gogh

quotes.q: Facts are the enemy of truth.
quotes.h:
“Facts are the enemy of truth. ” —
Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.q: It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
quotes.h:
“It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.” —
Tony Robbins

quotes.q: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
quotes.h:
“Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.” —
Unknown

quotes.q: Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you.
quotes.h:
“Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you.” —
Dr. Seuss

quotes.q: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
quotes.h:
“You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.” —
Stephen King

quotes.q: We need a backbone, not a wishbone.
quotes.h:
“We need a backbone, not a wishbone.” —
Joyce Meyer

quotes.q: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
quotes.h:
“The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.” —
Oprah Winfrey

quotes.q: To live is to be willing to die over and over again.
quotes.h:
“To live is to be willing to die over and over again.” —
Pema Chodron

quotes.q: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
quotes.h:
“Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.” —
Dan Brown

quotes.q: Just get out and do it. You will be very, very glad that you did.
quotes.h:
“Just get out and do it. You will be very, very glad that you did.” —
Christopher McCandless

quotes.q: One never does wrong by doing right.
quotes.h:
“One never does wrong by doing right.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.q: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.h:
“You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler. ” —
Denis Waitley

quotes.q: Our joy does not have to be based on our circumstances.
quotes.h:
“Our joy does not have to be based on our circumstances.” —
Joyce Meyer

quotes.q: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
quotes.h:
“The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.” —
Oprah Winfrey
